intro: Hello! I'm Yashica, a passionate full-stack developer fascinated by the galaxy and space tech.
about: Innovative software engineer (M.S. ITM, Illinois Tech) specializing in C++, Python, and scalable backend architectures for simulation, AI-driven data automation, and real-time analytics. Proven ability in optimizing asynchronous pipelines, integrating large language models, and designing sensor and synthetic data simulations. Effective collaborator with experience driving feature ownership, writing detailed documentation, and iterating products based on user and stakeholder feedback.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineering Intern
experience.description: Engineered Python FastAPI microservices integrated with Google Gemini LLM APIs to automate structured data reasoning and validation, improving data quality and cutting response latency by 30%. Designed and optimized React frontend features focused on real-time analytics visualization and user interaction; enhanced asynchronous data flows resulting in a 25% improved rendering performance. Led documentation and cross-functional code reviews, ensuring strict adherence to CI/CD pipelines that supported over 99% deployment reliability and speeding up team knowledge transfer. Collaborated remotely with engineering teams, conducting design discussions and contributing to architectural decisions focused on scalable synthetic data pipelines.

experience.title: Python Backend Developer Intern
experience.description: Engineered Python FastAPI microservices integrated with Google Gemini LLM APIs to automate structured data reasoning and validation, improving data quality and cutting response latency by 30%. Designed and optimized React frontend features focused on real-time analytics visualization and user interaction; enhanced asynchronous data flows resulting in a 25% improved rendering performance. Led documentation and cross-functional code reviews, ensuring strict adherence to CI/CD pipelines that supported over 99% deployment reliability and speeding up team knowledge transfer. Collaborated remotely with engineering teams, conducting design discussions and contributing to architectural decisions focused on scalable synthetic data pipelines.

experience.title: Data Engineer Intern
experience.description: Created automated, fault-tolerant data transformation and validation pipelines using Python and SQL, slashing reporting times by 75% while enhancing dataset accuracy and consistency. Developed visual analytics reporting tools enabling executives to make faster, more informed decisions with dynamic data visualization integrated into automated dashboards. Identified systemic data issues and implemented recovery and fault-handling protocols, increasing pipeline robustness and reducing downstream errors.

experience.title: Founder & Product Designer
experience.company: Starophia Sole (Handmade Resin Art Business), India
experience.description: Launched and scaled resin art business, producing and marketing 40+ unique products via Instagram and social platforms, achieving high customer engagement and repeat sales. Created a Java-based pricing automation app (NetBeans) to calculate optimal profit margins exceeding 50%, improving financial forecasting and operational efficiency. Continuously iterated products and packaging informed by direct buyer feedback, boosting customer satisfaction and managing supply logistics for pop-up events.

projects.name: Anime Tracker App
projects.description: Built a multi-platform anime tracking application using React frontend and Kotlin/Android client, supporting over 50 concurrent users with zero synchronization lag via Firebase Realtime Database. Implemented unit and integration tests for asynchronous API calls and data cache consistency, improving response accuracy by 20%. Incorporated offline caching to minimize redundant API requests, optimizing app performance and reducing server load by 45%. Led iterative UI/UX improvements based on real user feedback, backed by documentation of change logs and testing procedures.

projects.name: SafegArt - Sensor Prototype
projects.description: Designed and implemented C++ ultrasonic sensor software to measure object distance with ±3 cm accuracy, emulating autonomous vehicle proximity detection. Logged and analyzed signal data in structured CSV format to validate sensor precision across multiple physical tests. Developed test harnesses including sensor noise simulation and failure scenarios to ensure system robustness and reliability. Authored detailed technical documentation covering sensor integration, test methodologies, and usage guidelines to support team knowledge transfer.

projects.name: Loan Analysis System
projects.description: Engineered a JavaFX application for batch processing 500+ financial records, reducing loan eligibility computation time by 40% through optimized SQL query design and indexed tables. Modularized backend logic under MVC framework to ensure maintainability and scalability for future data simulation expansions. Created JUnit test suites covering 90% of business logic, increasing code reliability and facilitating regression testing. Documented system architecture and testing strategies for developer onboarding and future enhancements.

projects.name: Insurance Management System
projects.description: Developed a secure, role-based insurance dashboard featuring PBKDF2 session encryption for safe user authentication. Simulated claim approval workflows, improving UI load time by 25% and increasing error resilience through modular, test-driven component design. Authored automated test scripts for authentication and business logic, ensuring system stability and seamless regression testing. Maintained comprehensive documentation of APIs, security protocols, and test cases to streamline team collaboration.

projects.name: Mooney Manager
projects.description: Collaborated as part of a 4-member team to design, develop, and manage a real-time, multi-user finance management platform with Firebase backend. Managed project timelines, coordinated team tasks, and ensured consistent communication between frontend (React/PHP) and backend modules. Developed automated UI validation and backend endpoint testing suites to ensure robust functionality across different user scenarios. Documented application architecture, APIs, and testing outcomes to facilitate ongoing integration and smooth developer handoffs.

education.degree: M.S. in Information Technology and Management
education.institution: Illinois Institute of Technology, Chicago, IL
Symbiosis Institute of Computer Studies and Research, Pune, India

extraCurricular: Head of Social Mead Team of Indian Student Association @Illinois Tech, Resin Small Business Sole Owner.
